title: 3 Views of Saturday Night-Sunday Storm as It Happens
text:
I f you’re obsessively following the our Saturday night-Sunday storm, here are three views that will show you the action as rendered in one case by Doppler radar and in the others by a combination of weather models, supercomputers and digital visualization geniuses.
